scenes.description: I get that, but what if it happens again? Are we just going to rely on you every time?

options.text: Ideally, no. We should prepare better for such situations.
options.analysis: You suggest improving preparation, showing good self-regulation and social skills, but could improve on perception and empathy.

options.text: We can handle that when it comes. Let's focus on the present.
options.analysis: You suggest addressing future issues later, showing good perception and social skills, but empathy could be stronger.

options.text: If necessary, yes. But we should also build a more resilient team.
options.analysis: You agree with Bob but emphasize team resilience, demonstrating empathy but lower in perception and motivation.
